description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Grave Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Grave Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBane000000]{Bane}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFalseLife0]{False Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGentleRepo]{Gentle Repose}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRayOfEnfee]{Ray of Enfeeblement}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRevivify00]{Revivify}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplVampiricTo]{Vampiric Touch}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlight0000]{Blight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAntilifeSh]{Antilife Shell}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplRaiseDead0]{Raise Dead}
